definition: triforium (gallery of arches above side-aisle vaulting in the nave of a church)
to cup one's hands in salute/to surround/to arch/to dig earth with the snout/arched

sentences.english: Palm trees and pillared arcades cast shadows over the burning pavements.
sentences.chinese: 棕櫚樹和圓柱連環拱廊的陰影投在發燙的人行道上。

sentences.english: At this time of the morning, the arcade was almost empty.
sentences.chinese: 在早晨的這個時候，拱廊街上幾乎空無一人。

sentences.english: The flowers formed an archway above their heads.
sentences.chinese: 他們的頭頂上是一道花的拱廊。

sentences.english: Leonard : How did you manage to get on the second floor of the Glendale Galleria ?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼開到幽谷拱廊商場的二層樓上了？

sentences.english: There was a long line of taxis waiting under the pillared arcade.
sentences.chinese: 有一長排的計程車在有柱的拱廊下等。

sentences.english: I hunt around the arcade, eyes peeled for a dirty needle.
sentences.chinese: 我拱廊裏面搜尋，憑眼力追查髒的針頭。

definition: winding corridor/cloister/ambulatory (covered walkway around a cloister)
promenade/long hallway/Long Corridor in the Summer Palace, Beijing 北京頤和園|北京颐和园[Bei3 jing1 Yi2 he2 yuan2]
